test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dateTime-greater-than-14 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dateTime-greater-than" function used together with "fn:false"/or expression (ge operator). *******************************************************

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-001
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:two-digit($number as xs:integer) { let $string := string($number) return if (string-length($string) lt 2) then concat('0', $string) else $string }; declare function local:dateTime($year as xs:integer, $month as xs:integer, $day as xs:integer) { let $m := local:two-digit($month), $d := local:two-digit($day) return xs:dateTime(concat($year, '-', $m, '-', $d, "T12:00:00")) }; not(local:dateTime(2008, 05, 12) gt xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-002
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-006
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:two-digit($number as xs:integer) { let $string := string($number) return if (string-length($string) lt 2) then concat('0', $string) else $string }; declare function local:dateTime($year as xs:integer, $month as xs:integer, $day as xs:integer) { let $m := local:two-digit($month), $d := local:two-digit($day) return xs:dateTime(concat($year, '-', $m, '-', $d, "T12:00:00")) }; not(local:dateTime(2008, 05, 12) ge xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-011
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; exists(local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:true()) gt xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-012
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:false()) gt xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00")

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-013
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; exists(local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:true()) le xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-014
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:false()) le xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00")

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-015
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:dateTime( concat($dateTime, $timezone) ) }; adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(local:dateTime("1972-12-14T00:00:00", "-12:00")) gt adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T00:00:00+12:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-greater-than-016
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:dateTime( concat($dateTime, $timezone) ) }; adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(local:dateTime("1972-12-14T00:00:00", "-12:00")) ge adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T00:00:00+12:00"))
